info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 1 at 8:12PM CDT until November 1 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Brownsville TX
info.description:
SVRBRO
The National Weather Service in Brownsville has issued a
* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Kenedy County in Deep South Texas...
* Until 915 PM CDT.
* At 812 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of U S 77 Border Patrol Station, or 8 miles south of Sarita, moving southeast at 50 mph.
THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR CENTRAL KENEDY COUNTY.
HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.
IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles.
* Locations impacted include... Armstrong, Kenedy County Wind Farms, Norias, U S 77 Border Patrol Station, and Armstrong Ranch Airport.
info.instruction:
For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.

parameter.value: NWS:DESTRUCTIVE HAIL STORM in this area til 915 PM CDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING in effect for this area until 9:15 PM CDT for DESTRUCTIVE baseball size hail. Take shelter in a sturdy building, away from windows. People and animals outdoors will be severely injured.

parameter.value: SNM:TORMENTA DE GRANIZO DESTRUCTIVA en esta area hasta 915 PM CDT. Tome refugio ahora

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORMENTA SEVERA en efecto para esta area hasta las 9:15 PM CDT por granizo DESTRUCTIVO del tamano de una pelota de beisbol. Tome refugio en un edificio, alejado de las ventanas. Las personas y los animales al aire libre seran gravemente heridos.
